mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_TYPE_NO "boardTypeNo", BOARD_TYPE_NAME "boardTypeName" FROM "BOARD_TYPE" ORDER BY BOARD_TYPE_NO
SELECT BOARD_TYPE_NO "boardTypeNo", BOARD_TYPE_NAME "boardTypeName" FROM "BOARD_TYPE" ORDER BY BOARD_TYPE_NO
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD" WHERE BOARD_IS_DELETED = 'N' AND BOARD_TYPE_NO = #{boardTypeNo}

SELECT BOARD_ID, MEMBER_NICKNAME, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_VIEW_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" C WHERE C.BOARD_ID = B.BOARD_ID) BOARD_COMMENT_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD_LIKE" L WHERE L.BOARD_ID = B.BOARD_ID) BOARD_LIKE_COUNT,
CASE WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_CREATE_DATE < 1 / 24 / 60 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - BOARD_CREATE_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60) || '초 전'
WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_CREATE_DATE < 1 / 24 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - BOARD_CREATE_DATE) * 24 * 60) || '분 전'
WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_CREATE_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - BOARD_CREATE_DATE) * 24) || '시간 전'
ELSE TO_CHAR(BOARD_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END BOARD_CREATE_DATE
FROM "BOARD" B JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_IS_DELETED = 'N' AND BOARD_TYPE_NO = #{boardTypeNo} ORDER BY BOARD_ID DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD"
JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO)
WHERE BOARD_IS_DELETED = 'N' AND BOARD_TYPE_NO = #{boardTypeNo}
AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
AND BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
AND ( BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' OR BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' )
AND MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'

SELECT BOARD_ID, MEMBER_NICKNAME, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_VIEW_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" C WHERE C.BOARD_ID = B.BOARD_ID) COMMENT_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD_LIKE" L WHERE L.BOARD_ID = B.BOARD_ID) LIKE_COUNT,
CASE WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_CREATE_DATE < 1 / 24 / 60 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - BOARD_CREATE_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60) || '초 전'
WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_CREATE_DATE < 1 / 24 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - BOARD_CREATE_DATE) * 24 * 60) || '분 전'
WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_CREATE_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - BOARD_CREATE_DATE) * 24) || '시간 전'
ELSE TO_CHAR(BOARD_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END BOARD_CREATE_DATE
FROM "BOARD" B JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_IS_DELETED = 'N' AND BOARD_TYPE_NO = #{boardTypeNo}
AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
AND BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
AND ( BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' OR BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' )
AND MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
ORDER BY BOARD_ID DESC

SELECT LEVEL, C.* FROM (SELECT COMMENT_NO, COMMENT_CONTENT, COMMENT_WRITE_DATE, BOARD_ID, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NICKNAME, PROFILE_IMG, PARENT_COMMENT_NO, COMMENT_DEL_FL FROM "COMMENT" JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_ID = #{boardId}) C WHERE COMMENT_DEL_FL = 'N' OR 0 != (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" SUB WHERE SUB.PARENT_COMMENT_NO = C.COMMENT_NO AND COMMENT_DEL_FL = 'N') START WITH PARENT_COMMENT_NO IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR COMMENT_NO = PARENT_COMMENT_NO ORDER SIBLINGS BY COMMENT_NO

SELECT BOARD_ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_TYPE_NO, BOARD_TYPE_NAME, BOARD_VIEW_COUNT, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NICKNAME, PROFILE_IMG, TO_CHAR(BOARD_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24:MI:SS') BOARD_CREATE_DATE, TO_CHAR(BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24:MI:SS') BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD_LIKE" WHERE BOARD_ID = #{boardId}) LIKE_COUNT FROM "BOARD" JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) JOIN "BOARD_TYPE" USING(BOARD_TYPE_NO) WHERE BOARD_IS_DELETED = 'N' AND BOARD_TYPE_NO = #{boardTypeNo} AND BOARD_ID = #{boardId}
SELECT SUBSTR(PROFILE_IMG, INSTR(PROFILE_IMG, '/', -1) + 1) "rename" FROM "MEMBER" UNION SELECT CAST(IMG_RENAME AS VARCHAR2(300)) "rename" FROM "BOARD_IMG"

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT
B.*, CASE WHEN (SYSDATE - B.BOARD_CREATE_DATE) <= 1 THEN 1 ELSE 2 END AS IS_NEW,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" C WHERE C.BOARD_ID = B.BOARD_ID) AS BOARD_COMMENT_COUNT,
ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY B.BOARD_TYPE_NO ORDER BY B.BOARD_ID DESC ) AS MAIN_CP,
ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY B.BOARD_TYPE_NO ORDER BY B.BOARD_VIEW_COUNT DESC, B.BOARD_ID DESC ) AS RANK
FROM "BOARD" B WHERE B.BOARD_IS_DELETED = 'N' AND B.BOARD_CREATE_DATE >= SYSDATE - 7 ) WHERE RANK <= 5 AND ROWNUM <= 30 ORDER BY BOARD_TYPE_NO, RANK
